name: sleet-hello
title: Sleet X Near
description: A hello extension by Sleet for interacting with the near blockchain.
author: nonresistant

commands.name: get-greeting
commands.title: Get Greeting
commands.description: Fetch and display the greeting from the NEAR blockchain

commands.name: update-greeting
commands.title: Update Greeting
commands.description: Update the greeting on the NEAR blockchain using your credentials

commands.name: web4-apps
commands.title: Browse Web4 Apps
commands.description: Browse and open Web4 apps on NEAR blockchain

commands.name: near-cli
commands.title: Near Cli
commands.description: Run NEAR CLI commands directly from Raycast

commands.name: submit-web4-app
commands.title: Submit Web4 App
commands.description: Submit or update your Web4 app to the catalog

commands.name: near-dapps
commands.title: Browse Near Dapps
commands.description: Discover and open popular NEAR ecosystem applications

preferences.name: networkId
preferences.title: NEAR Network
preferences.description: Select which NEAR network to connect to

preferences.name: rpcEndpoint
preferences.title: RPC Endpoint
preferences.description: Select the RPC endpoint for the chosen network

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
